Question: Sharp Electronics Corp. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Sharp Electronics Corp.

Exhibit Highlights at CES 2024:

Smart Living
- Features a virtual docent powered by CE-LLM edge AI technology
- High Speed Oven with reduced cooking times
- Hair dryers and stick vacuum cleaners with low noise and high power
- Non-contact vital sensors and world's smallest vital sensors for wearable devices
- AQUOS XLED TV model for the global market

Smart Industry
- XR glass for visualizing conversations and ideas
- Polymer lens camera and ultra-compact camera
- AI olfactory sensor for scent recognition
- IMS gas analyzer and gas decomposition module
- Driver monitoring camera for safe driving support

Sustainability
- Reflective LCD signage and ePoster with low power consumption
- Indoor photovoltaic device LC-LH for efficient power generation
- TV remote control with LC-LH device
- Space Solar Sheet for high power generating efficiency

Location: 17229, Central Hall, Las Vegas Convention Center (Nevada, USA)
Exhibit dates and time: January 9 to January 12, 2024; 10:00 to 18:00
